content: real estate billionaire reality tv star presidentdonald trump inherited a fortune from his father but he wanted moreshrewd and indefatigable he never missed an opportunity to expand his holdings he transformed himself into an international brand he marketed his personality into a product he built an empire but that wasnt enough he wanted to be president and he was willing to do and say whatever it tookdonald trump who never held political office pulled off his ultimate acquisition the hostile takeover of the republican party everyone was shocked  except those who knew him
title: trump a graphic biography
